conbody.p: The Bricsys 24/7 Transfer Tool allows you to transfer multiple documents between your local file system and the Bricsys 24/7 service. The split screen user interface allows you to upload or download files via drag and drop.
conbody.note: For more information, see the guide How to upload documents with metadata and the Metadata template. @@@ content in PDF outdated, Chapoo is the old name for Bricsys 24/7
